Poga Package¶

Note

Current Version

Poga: 0.1.2

YogaLayout: 1.19.0

How to install poga package?¶

pip install poga

from poga.libpoga_capi import *

def main():
   node = YGNodeNew()
   YGNodeFree(node)

Submodules¶

pybind11 libpoga_capi plugin
